lore: At the dawn of civilization, the Amaranths fell from the sky. Yseros hurried to Eternity's End and met with Vertraag. "Was that you?" she asked. "No," answered the God of Time. A smile appeared on his face. "It was no one. They were already here."\n\nWhen a spell hits the Enclave Amaranth, part of the magic bounces off its body and moves toward the caster. It is common to find groups of these creatures after a natural disaster, staring at the damage.
menagerieDialog: (You can't seem to catch its attention at all...)
(Such a mysterious creature. You suspect you'll never fully understand them.)
(It seems to be highly observant of its surroundings.)
(It's spinning around on its side. Pretty cool, really.)
(Its inability to blink unsettles you. Its lonely eye constantly scans up and down, left and right - as if it's always searching for something.)
name: Enclave Amaranth
